create table 'instructor-detail' (
    'id' int not null auto_increment,
    'youtube_channel' varchar(128) default null,
    'hobby' varchar(45) default null,
    primary key (id)
)

// generated by intellij

-- auto-generated definition
create table instructor
(
    id                   int auto_increment
        primary key,
    first_name           varchar(45) null,
    last_name            varchar(45) null,
    email                varchar(45) null,
    instructor_detail_id int         null,
    constraint instructor_id_uindex
        unique (id),
    constraint instructor_detail_fk
        foreign key (instructor_detail_id) references `instructor-detail` (id)
);


-- auto-generated definition
create table `instructor-detail`
(
    id              int auto_increment
        primary key,
    youtube_channel varchar(128) null,
    hobby           varchar(45)  null,
    constraint `instructor-detail_id_uindex`
        unique (id)
);
